conbody.p: Most malware today consists of blended threats, which combine two or more technologies, to bypass computer security protocols. Trend Micro and TXOne combats this complex malware with products that create a custom defense strategy. The Threat Encyclopedia provides a comprehensive list of names and symptoms for various blended threats, including known malware, spam, malicious URLs, and known vulnerabilities.
Go to and to learn more about:

li.p: Malware and malicious mobile code currently active or "in the wild"
Correlated threat information pages to form a complete web attack story
Internet threat advisories about targeted attacks and security threats
Web attack and online trend information
